Terre Haute, Indiana
Dear Mr* Bays
I m very happy to inform you officially that the Board of Directors of MB
has approved your application for associate membership in our association.
Tou will now be receiving regularly from us the monthly MB Sflari^t»t
additional publications of interest, and many other things. Tou should, of
course, feel free to write to this office at any time for any information
concerning broadcasting *
Under separate cover we are sending you a copy of the MB Mio*Tar^lir^glnia
MttLioeraiihr. which we hope you will find helpful.
Perhaps the greatest good of an MB membership is the associations you form.
It1# good to know that others are having the same problems you are and how
they are solving them* It has been the tradition with HASH to exchange this
sort of information on a fTiend-to^friend basis* Tou1!! find lots of friena
in mm.
Sincerely yours.
Frank £• Schooley
